description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Try to collect as many money bags as you can, while avoiding baddies. Up to 3 friends can join you to help you collect more money and find the exit to win! A very addicting and fun game, which is randomly generated, so you will never play the same game twice!
